summary: This code is for an asynchronous write function in XGWedis, which supports specifying a time interval to write the database, helping avoid performance issues caused by frequent file updates.

details.comment: This code is for an asynchronous write function in XGWedis, which supports specifying a time interval to write the database, helping avoid performance issues caused by frequent file updates.
details.content:
#  异步写XGWedis
1. 支持指定时间写一次db (避免变动频繁的文件重复写入,带来的性能问题);
